title: Diddy speaks to children briefly from jail; they are in a state of shock
content: ​​Diddy shares Christian, Jessie and D’Lila with the late model and actress Kim Porter, who died in 2018 at age 47. Quincy was Porter’s son with partner Al B. Sure!, and Diddy adopted him. He shares Justin with stylist Misa Hylton, and Chance with businesswoman Sarah Chapman. His youngest child Love was born in December 2022. Her mother is model Dana Tran.
summary: ​​Diddy shares Christian, Jessie and D’Lila with the late model and actress Kim Porter, who died in 2018 at age 47. Quincy was Porter’s son with partner Al B. Sure!, and Diddy adopted him. He shares Justin with stylist Misa Hylton, and Chance with businesswoman Sarah Chapman. His youngest child Love was born in December 2022. Her mother is model Dana Tran.

title: US News college rankings 2025: List of top universities
content: US News and World Report announced its 2025 rankings for nearly 1,500 U.S. colleges and universities. Categories include best national universities, best national liberal arts colleges, top public schools, top historically black colleges and universities, and top performers on social mobility. US News advises considering these rankings alongside other information when choosing a college.
summary: US News and World Report announced its 2025 rankings for nearly 1,500 U.S. colleges and universities. Categories include best national universities, best national liberal arts colleges, top public schools, top historically black colleges and universities, and top performers on social mobility. US News advises considering these rankings alongside other information when choosing a college.

title: Biden acknowledges he's running out of time as violence escalates in Middle-East: Aides
content: President Joe Biden acknowledges limited time to secure a ceasefire and hostage deal with Hamas amid escalating Middle-East tensions. Aides express frustration over Israeli PM Netanyahu's contradictory actions. The US is sending additional troops to the region due to rising violence between Israel and Hezbollah, while Biden prepares for his last major speech at the UN General Assembly.
summary: President Joe Biden acknowledges limited time to secure a ceasefire and hostage deal with Hamas amid escalating Middle-East tensions. Aides express frustration over Israeli PM Netanyahu's contradictory actions. The US is sending additional troops to the region due to rising violence between Israel and Hezbollah, while Biden prepares for his last major speech at the UN General Assembly.

title: Singapore commissions two new submarines as Asia's undersea rivalry grows
content: Singapore has commissioned two new advanced submarines named Invincible and Impeccable. Ordered from Germany in 2013, these vessels enhance the country's naval capabilities with advanced technology that allows operation farther from shore using fewer sailors. They also feature air-independent propulsion systems and facilities for female crew members.
summary: Singapore has commissioned two new advanced submarines named Invincible and Impeccable. Ordered from Germany in 2013, these vessels enhance the country's naval capabilities with advanced technology that allows operation farther from shore using fewer sailors. They also feature air-independent propulsion systems and facilities for female crew members.

title: American hiker found dead on South Africa's Table Mountain
content: Brook Cheuvront, a 20-year-old student from North Carolina, went missing while hiking on South Africa’s Table Mountain and was later found dead. She had been in Cape Town for an internship. Her body was discovered on Devil’s Peak, and an investigation is ongoing to determine the cause of her death.
summary: Brook Cheuvront, a 20-year-old student from North Carolina, went missing while hiking on South Africa’s Table Mountain and was later found dead. She had been in Cape Town for an internship. Her body was discovered on Devil’s Peak, and an investigation is ongoing to determine the cause of her death.

title: Is approaching tropical cyclone a threat to Sunita Williams and Crew-9's launch?
content: Nasa and SpaceX plan to launch the Crew-9 mission to the International Space Station on September 26, featuring astronauts Nick Hague and Aleksandr Gorbunov. Tropical Cyclone Nine may influence the launch schedule. The astronauts will conduct experiments and maintenance for five months aboard the space station, with a Falcon 9 rocket undergoing a static fire test beforehand.
summary: Nasa and SpaceX plan to launch the Crew-9 mission to the International Space Station on September 26, featuring astronauts Nick Hague and Aleksandr Gorbunov. Tropical Cyclone Nine may influence the launch schedule. The astronauts will conduct experiments and maintenance for five months aboard the space station, with a Falcon 9 rocket undergoing a static fire test beforehand.

title: Bird Photographer of the Year 2024: A showcase of exceptional avian photography
Kamala Harris set to visit US-Mexico border amid immigration debate
content: Vice President Kamala Harris plans a visit to the US-Mexico border in Arizona, focusing on immigration issues and countering Trump's voter appeal. This will be her first trip since Biden's withdrawal from the race. Amid criticisms of her handling of migration, the visit aims to regain voter trust and address key concerns.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris plans a visit to the US-Mexico border in Arizona, focusing on immigration issues and countering Trump's voter appeal. This will be her first trip since Biden's withdrawal from the race. Amid criticisms of her handling of migration, the visit aims to regain voter trust and address key concerns.

title: Singapore's Indian-origin ex-transport minister no longer facing corruption charges
content: S. Iswaran, Singapore's former transport minister of Indian origin, no longer faces corruption charges but will be prosecuted for five other counts including obtaining valuable items as a public servant and obstructing justice. With the prosecution dropping charges under the Prevention of Corruption Act, Iswaran is expected to plead guilty. He was earlier granted SGD 800,000 bail.
summary: S. Iswaran, Singapore's former transport minister of Indian origin, no longer faces corruption charges but will be prosecuted for five other counts including obtaining valuable items as a public servant and obstructing justice. With the prosecution dropping charges under the Prevention of Corruption Act, Iswaran is expected to plead guilty. He was earlier granted SGD 800,000 bail.

title: Hurricane John makes landfall in Mexico as Category 3 storm
content: Hurricane John has made landfall in Mexico as a Category 3 storm with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph. Authorities have issued warnings and urged residents to seek higher ground for safety. Evacuations and shelter arrangements are underway, highlighting the severity of the situation and increasing frequency of rapid hurricane intensification.
summary: Hurricane John has made landfall in Mexico as a Category 3 storm with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph. Authorities have issued warnings and urged residents to seek higher ground for safety. Evacuations and shelter arrangements are underway, highlighting the severity of the situation and increasing frequency of rapid hurricane intensification.

title: Watch: Trump visits grocery store in Pennsylvania, vows to lower prices once elected
content: Former US President Donald Trump visited a grocery store in Kittanning, Pennsylvania, during a campaign stop. He interacted with customers, promising to lower grocery prices if elected. Trump handed $100 to a local mother for her groceries and emphasized his plans to address inflation and support local businesses. He later held a town hall with farmers in Smithton.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump visited a grocery store in Kittanning, Pennsylvania, during a campaign stop. He interacted with customers, promising to lower grocery prices if elected. Trump handed $100 to a local mother for her groceries and emphasized his plans to address inflation and support local businesses. He later held a town hall with farmers in Smithton.

title: Elon Musk calls Italy’s Meloni ‘authentic, honest’ at awards gala
content: Elon Musk lauded Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni at a New York awards ceremony, emphasizing her authenticity and honesty. Meloni received the Atlantic Council Global Citizen Award for supporting the EU and being Italy's first female prime minister. They are set to discuss investment opportunities in Italy’s space and AI sectors.
summary: Elon Musk lauded Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni at a New York awards ceremony, emphasizing her authenticity and honesty. Meloni received the Atlantic Council Global Citizen Award for supporting the EU and being Italy's first female prime minister. They are set to discuss investment opportunities in Italy’s space and AI sectors.

title: Nearly 500 dead as Israel strikes 1,300 targets in Lebanon
content: Israel's airstrikes on southern Lebanon resulted in nearly 500 deaths and 1,650 injuries, mainly targeting Hezbollah members. This escalation follows an incident involving Hezbollah's communication devices. The US calls for restraint and prepares for potential evacuations. Cross-border rocket fire has intensified since last October's conflict with Hamas.
summary: Israel's airstrikes on southern Lebanon resulted in nearly 500 deaths and 1,650 injuries, mainly targeting Hezbollah members. This escalation follows an incident involving Hezbollah's communication devices. The US calls for restraint and prepares for potential evacuations. Cross-border rocket fire has intensified since last October's conflict with Hamas.

title: Rare 18th century diamond necklace heads to auction – What’s the cost?
content: Sotheby's plans to auction a rare 18th-century diamond necklace in Geneva on November 11. Comprising around 500 diamonds and potentially linked to Marie Antoinette, the piece is estimated to fetch between $1.8 and $2.8 million. The necklace will be displayed in London before being shown in Hong Kong, New York, and Taiwan.
summary: Sotheby's plans to auction a rare 18th-century diamond necklace in Geneva on November 11. Comprising around 500 diamonds and potentially linked to Marie Antoinette, the piece is estimated to fetch between $1.8 and $2.8 million. The necklace will be displayed in London before being shown in Hong Kong, New York, and Taiwan.

title: 5.6 magnitude earthquake triggers tsunami warning in Japan
content: A 5.6-magnitude earthquake struck near Japan’s Izu Islands, leading to a tsunami warning predicting waves up to 1 meter. A smaller tsunami of about 50 centimeters was detected on Hachijo Island. No immediate damage or injuries were reported, highlighting Japan's preparedness for such events due to its location on the Pacific “Ring of Fire.”
summary: A 5.6-magnitude earthquake struck near Japan’s Izu Islands, leading to a tsunami warning predicting waves up to 1 meter. A smaller tsunami of about 50 centimeters was detected on Hachijo Island. No immediate damage or injuries were reported, highlighting Japan's preparedness for such events due to its location on the Pacific “Ring of Fire.”

title: California mandates smartphone restrictions in schools to boost focus
content: California school districts are now required to create rules limiting student smartphone use under a new law signed by Governor Gavin Newsom. The legislation aims to curb classroom distractions and address social media's negative impact on students' mental health. Districts must implement policies by July 1, 2026, updating them every five years.
summary: California school districts are now required to create rules limiting student smartphone use under a new law signed by Governor Gavin Newsom. The legislation aims to curb classroom distractions and address social media's negative impact on students' mental health. Districts must implement policies by July 1, 2026, updating them every five years.

title: Widow of tech billionaire faces $250M lawsuit for ‘reputational damage’ following Bayesian Superyacht sinking
content: A lawyer representing the builder of the Bayesian superyacht that sank off Sicily has filed a $250 million lawsuit against Mike Lynch's widow. The Italian Sea Group (TISG) denies authorizing this legal action and seeks its withdrawal. The sinking led to substantial business losses and reputational damage for TISG.
summary: A lawyer representing the builder of the Bayesian superyacht that sank off Sicily has filed a $250 million lawsuit against Mike Lynch's widow. The Italian Sea Group (TISG) denies authorizing this legal action and seeks its withdrawal. The sinking led to substantial business losses and reputational damage for TISG.

title: In Iran, old-time US radio detective 'Johnny Dollar' returns
US' Florida on high alert as Hurricane Helene approaches
content: Florida's Gulf Coast and Panhandle are on alert as Tropical Storm Nine strengthens into a potential hurricane. Governor Ron DeSantis declared a state of emergency for 41 counties to facilitate preparations. The National Hurricane Center warns of dangerous rip currents, storm surges, damaging winds, and heavy rainfall beginning Wednesday. Residents should make emergency plans and know their evacuation zones.
summary: Florida's Gulf Coast and Panhandle are on alert as Tropical Storm Nine strengthens into a potential hurricane. Governor Ron DeSantis declared a state of emergency for 41 counties to facilitate preparations. The National Hurricane Center warns of dangerous rip currents, storm surges, damaging winds, and heavy rainfall beginning Wednesday. Residents should make emergency plans and know their evacuation zones.

title: Venezuela issues arrest warrant for Argentina president over plane 'theft'
